name: dubtrack.fm - Large chat ranks
description: For people who really want to see ranks in chat Requires DubX!
additional_info: Introduction This is intended for DubX users, to be used with Better Chat. Used alone, it'll look a little funny, and appear just for you. This was created mostly for fun, but people who want to make it a serious part of their DubTrack theme can use it to do so. Chat ranks are aligned to the right, in pseudochildren, centered with the user avatar. Bugs Due to how DubX handles creator rank (rather, how it doesn't), all creators are also co-owners. This is only a minor inconvenience for theme maintainers, as you can allow specific users by default; Until that is fixed, replace .isCreator in line 49 (or about that) with the ID number of the room creator, or stuff that under user-specific settings. GitHub release If you want the code straight away for addition into your community theme, then get it here. It looks as intended when used with Better Chat, but can also be used alone.
